message: Greed!! That is what happened to Americans.

Knowledge of heaven and hell, Angels and watchers has been revealed in the bible. Though some have had glimpses of these realms within our realm, Jesus revealed he alone is the way the truth and the life, he made the way for us to enter this wonderful paradise by sacrificing his life to bring down the barrier of our fallen state and the judgement that was against us. In fact, we experience some of his gifts now in receiving communication from him, healings and deliverance.

I celebrate this time of year for the same reason your church decided to back in around 350 CE ...the winter solstice; a solar event which has been celebrated since the dawn of mankind, many tens and possibly hundreds of thousands of years before the papyrus scribblings of some fearful desert dwellers... It really doesn't matter how un-Christlike you people act by trying to exclude the secular world from the joy and fellowship of the season...because: history. Happy holidays, I hope you have a nice Christmas. I'm pretty sure your Jesus would want EVERYONE to enjoy the season...even us heathens. Sorry you don't like the idea of sharing something that your religion stole in the first place.

So someone is gonna send more than a billion on the elections? Cause the Kochs have publicly stated they plan on spending that much if not more. The only nutcase is you if you think the Koch bros don't have major major influence on the Republican party, and have had so for at least a decade. It's all public record, go look it up yourself.
